text:
Quikly | Detroit, MI | FULL-TIME | ONSITE Quikly is venture-backed Detroit startup founded in 2012 that works with some of the world's most recognizable consumer brands.

Our engineering team has six developers with skills in Ruby (Rails), Go, Javascript (React), Redis, and Postgres.

We are hiring the following: * Director of Engineering * Frontend Engineers (React, ES6) * Backend Engineers (Ruby, Rails, Go, Node, PostgreSQL)

If you're interested, check out the full descriptions at (http://jobs.quikly.com)
